Software Description: [LoJax](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0397) is a UEFI rootkit used by [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) to persist remote access software on targeted systems.(Citation: ESET LoJax Sept 2018)
Mitigation Description: Restrict the ability to modify certain hives or keys in the Windows Registry.
Application: Ensure proper permissions are set for Registry hives to prevent users from modifying keys for system components that may lead to privilege escalation.
Use: [LoJax](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0397) has modified the Registry key ???HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\BootExecute??? from ???autocheck autochk *??? to ???autocheck autoche *???.
